titles.title: A bill entitled "the National Peace Garden Reauthorization Act".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S56)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-572.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 1/25/1994--Introduced. Extends the authorization of the National Peace Garden to establish a Peace Garden in the District of Columbia to June 30, 1997. Deems any reference in a record of the United States to the Peace Garden Project, Inc., to be a reference to the National Peace Garden.
